ns2:test-suite.name: In order to prove that the select 100 page works As a test user I need to verify the functionality does what it's supposed to do:
ns2:test-suite.title: In order to prove that the select 100 page works As a test user I need to verify the functionality does what it's supposed to do:

test-case.name: Given I am at the homepage And I have not selected any items before Then there are no items selected on the screen
test-case.title: Given I am at the homepage And I have not selected any items before Then there are no items selected on the screen

step.name: I grab number of visible elements "//div[@class='grid__item grid__item--selected']"
step.title: I grab number of visible elements "//div[@class='grid__item grid__item--selected']"

test-case.name: Given I am at the homepage And I have not selected any items before Then there are 100 items unselected on the screen
test-case.title: Given I am at the homepage And I have not selected any items before Then there are 100 items unselected on the screen

step.name: I grab number of visible elements "//div[@class='grid__item ']"
step.title: I grab number of visible elements "//div[@class='grid__item ']"

test-case.name: Given I am at the homepage And I have selected item 0 Then item 0 is selected
test-case.title: Given I am at the homepage And I have selected item 0 Then item 0 is selected

test-case.name: Given I am at the homepage And I have scrolled down to and selected item 100 Then item 100 is selected
test-case.title: Given I am at the homepage And I have scrolled down to and selected item 100 Then item 100 is selected

test-case.name: Given I am at the homepage And I have selected item 12 And I have checked that it is selected And I have selected item 12 again And I have checked that it is unselected And I have refreshed the page Then the item remains unselected
test-case.title: Given I am at the homepage And I have selected item 12 And I have checked that it is selected And I have selected item 12 again And I have checked that it is unselected And I have refreshed the page Then the item remains unselected

test-case.name: Given I am at the homepage And I have selected item 10 And I have refreshed the page Then item 10 is selected
test-case.title: Given I am at the homepage And I have selected item 10 And I have refreshed the page Then item 10 is selected

failure.message: element (//div[@class='grid__item grid__item--selected'][contains(., 'item-10' )]) still not present on page after 5 sec waiting for XPath `//div[@class='grid__item grid__item--selected'][contains(., 'item-10' )]` failed: timeout 5000ms exceeded
